name: Numberjoin2048
description:
Google Play Store Link:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thickapps.number.join2048

Number Join 2048

An interesting and challenging game of joining the number blocks to reach maximum 2 square.

Play: Just tap the screen on which path the numbers needs to be dropped.
Join the same numbers to get replaced with a single maximum 2 square number.

Provided with Smooth Graphics and player options.
